subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jose Bautista injured his wrist on July 16 and was forced to have season-ending surgery. The Yankees can only hope that is not the path that Mark Teixeira will follow.
snippet: Jose Bautista injured his wrist on July 16 and was forced to have season-ending surgery. The Yankees can only hope that is not the path that Mark Teixeira will follow.
